name: X-Wing
description: X-Wing is a mid-level indica-dominant strain with dark purple foliage and lightly frosted buds. This Skywalker OG phenotype exhibits OG Kush flavors like earth and spice coupled with the pungent aroma of forest floor. X-Wing is surprisingly heady while still offering medium-weight body effects that curb pain, encourage rest and relaxation, and dissipate stress.
attributes_title: Happy, Sleepy, Relaxed, Creative, Hungry, Stress, Depression, Insomnia, Pain, Lack of Appetite, Dry Mouth
